hero_desc: Discover local MSME products from various regions of the Archipelago — from batik, weaving, wood carving, to traditional culinary delights. All in one platform to support Indonesian cultural pride.
about_desc: RupaNusa was born as a digital space to celebrate the culture of the Archipelago. We connect thousands of MSMEs, artisans, artists, and Indonesians through a platform that presents quality local products with a modern and secure shopping experience. Our focus is not only on transactions but on preserving cultural values, empowering the local economy, and making Indonesian works relevant in the global market. Every product carries a story, every MSME carries hope.
vis_text: To become the largest cultural platform and local e-commerce in Indonesia, serving not just as a transaction place, but as a center for preserving the identity of the Archipelago. RupaNusa aims to bring Indonesia's cultural richness to the world while becoming the foundation of an MSME-based creative economy.
mis_1: Strengthening the MSME ecosystem through modern digital technology.
mis_2: Providing a safe, credible, and user-friendly platform for all users.
mis_3: Preserving culture by promoting authentic and high-quality local works.
mis_4: Connecting Indonesian MSMEs with national and international markets.
mis_5: Delivering a shopping experience that is humanist, informative, and full of cultural values.
val_auth_desc: We ensure that every product is an original work of local artisans. No imitation, no blurring of values. Only authentic Archipelago works.
val_sust_desc: RupaNusa encourages eco-friendly business practices and supports cultural preservation through the sustainability of techniques, materials, and local traditions.
val_fair_desc: Every MSME has the same right to grow. We provide equal space for small businesses to compete healthily in the digital market.
why_1_desc: Every MSME goes through a curation process, ensuring authentic, quality products that truly represent the cultural values of the Archipelago.
why_2_desc: We use secure payment systems, data encryption, and strong consumer protection to maintain comfort in every transaction.
why_3_desc: Every product carries a story: who made it, how it was processed, to the philosophy inherited from generation to generation.
contact_sub: We are always ready to help you regarding services, partnerships, or other inquiries.
faq_sub: Complete information about RupaNusa—from shopping, product safety to opportunities to become a seller.
footer_desc: A platform connecting Archipelago culture with the world, presenting the best MSME products, handicrafts, and artworks.
footer_sub_desc: Get the latest updates on Archipelago culture and exclusive offers.
